input.sentences: looks like some friends are out for an evening of fun .
two gentleman are eating pizza but want to hide from the camera for a bit of fun .
a lovely lady is going to meet the one gentleman for food and drinks .
another happy couple out for an evening of food and drink .
look how happy they are posing for the camera | must be time to head home .
output.sentences: A group of friends had fun last evening.
The gentleman on the right tried to hide his pizza from the camera.
They met a lovely lady at the restaurant.
It was a happy time with great food last evening.
He took some time posing with the lovely lady he met last night.
